description: Since 2019, our business has been proudly operating from our workshop located in the heart of Norwood, South East London. Over the years, this location has become the home for our fabrication and business operations. Conveniently situated in one of Londonâ€™s vibrant and diverse areas, our workshop serves as the central hub for our innovative work, enabling us to provide high-quality sets.

events.name: Drop in: Tour of an operating bespoke workshop
Drop in: Tour of an operating bespoke workshop

factsheet.heading: Building Bio
paragraphs: The Fables Creative warehouse finds itself in the middle of a tucked away Norwood Junction industrial yard, a hub for metalworkers and mechanics. The building itself; formerly an ambulance Depot in the 1950s is a spacious brick construction with the high ceilings necessary for the large scale works of the Fables team. Shortly after moving in the Fables began internal renovations creating a mezzanine floor, internal offices and storage rooms clad in minimalist aesthetic from up-cycled birch panelling left over from a previous advert install. The workshop has been a continously growing space, now featuring a spraying room for paint and lacquer, CNC facilities and  a clean burning wood furnace supplied by EU green grant funding (believe it or not this way of dealing with wood waste is far more carbon efficient than sending to landfill). It is a space that looks different every day due to the wildly varied projects that are taken on daily by Fables.

travel_info: Additional travel info: We are located an 8 minute walk from Norwood junction station which is on the Windrush Line and also is 1 stop from London bridge.

name: Fables Creative Workshop
